page.title: 18A Child's Day, Wickhambreaux
page.content: First I get up at about half past seven because my sister goes to a secondary school in Canterbury and has to catch the Plucks Gutter bus at 7.55. I get up at the same time because I can help pack her lunch. After my sister has caught her bus I talk to my mum and sometimes I watch the television. I dress and wash and go up stairs and tidy my room. At about 8.30 I grab my coat and bag and wait for Kelly. We take her to school and her mum picks us up in the afternoon. { ***** At School. ***** First we have assembly; we sing songs and one of the teachers tells us a story. After assembly we have our lessons; sometimes we have the Rector who teaches us R.E. After school we have some clubs like Gym Club, Computer Club and various others.
